The sex scenes were fantastic as well, I quite enjoyed the morning blowjob scene before school though I would have preferred some close-ups of that scene as well but, I guess the erotic nature comes from not being able to completely see It, sort of like how people enjoy softcore porn which Is vastly inferior to hentai. The doggy style and bathroom scenes were the best of the bunch and I enjoyed them the most, I sadly could not get a hard-on since I was having breakfast as I read this and as a man smokes on time so do I fap, but that was not the fault of the work. Overall I rate this work a 10/10 and I Implore you to read It and favorite It.

ponphrase has done It again, he has reinvented the genre and added something new to It, this work was originally released 2 or 3 months ago but I am glad that we finally got a translation, and I never expected this at all. Art style is fantastic, I always have loved how much depth his art has an overall shading and gradients done In a very simplistic way, It reminds me of that Minecraft texture pack that makes everything smooth. The psychological aspect was the best and the simplest In this one, since he just met a random chick on the side of the street who also happens to be a secret agent and gets to fuck her with just 1 cup of coffee, the kid is going places, that brings to me the third point and the best which Is the story, I have never In my life seen a shota hentai with this type of story and It Is god tier, and the second to last page where the kid was about to die from a car but didn't....It really reaffirmed how much of a badass ponphrase Is with story and pacing.
God, fucking tier
